data.comment: The match has started.
Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
In the minute 4, In Tambov, Georgi Melkadze of Akhmat Grozny is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Tambov.
Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Throw-in Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 9, Tambov needs to be cautious. Akhmat Grozny have an attacking throw-in.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 12, Akhmat Grozny attack but Vladimir Iljin's header doesn't find the target.
Tambov have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 14, Bernard Berisha for Akhmat Grozny drives towards goal at Spartak Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Sergei Ivanov awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Akhmat Grozny capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tambov's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tambov.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Tambov throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half.
Aleksandre Karapetian (Tambov) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 30, Tambov have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny at Spartak Stadium.
In the minute 33, Free kick Tambov.
At Spartak Stadium, Maksim Maksimovich Nenahov has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Important block from the Tambov defence as Artem Timofeev fires in a strike for Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 35, In Tambov a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Akhmat Grozny push forward at Spartak Stadium and Artem Polyarus gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Tambov defence.
Free kick in a good position for Akhmat Grozny!
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Tambov.
Akhmat Grozny's Artem Polyarus gets in a shot on goal at Spartak Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Tambov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 40, Ball safe as Akhmat Grozny is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Tambov close to the penalty box.
In the minute 43, Goal kick for Tambov at Spartak Stadium.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny.
In Tambov a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
German Onugha is booked for the home team.
Akhmat Grozny's Bernard Berisha gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
The first-half has come to a close in Tambov.
The second-half is underway at Spartak Stadium.
In the minute 46, Akhmat Grozny's Bernard Berisha is on target but unsuccessful.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Tambov to take a throw-in in Akhmat Grozny territory.
Akhmat Grozny pushes forward through Anton Shvets, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tambov drives forward and German Onugha gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 53, Tambov have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Tambov's Aleksey Rybin gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Akhmat Grozny defender.
Aleksandre Karapetian of Tambov gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 53, Sergei Ivanov awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
Free kick Tambov.
Ball goes out of play for a Akhmat Grozny goal kick.
In the minute 56, In Tambov Akhmat Grozny attack through Artem Polyarus. The finish is off target, however.
Tambov have a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Artem Polyarus with Evgeny Kharin. This is the first substitution made today by Andrey Talalaev.
Akhmat Grozny are coming forward and Anton Shvets gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tambov.
In the minute 57, Andrey Talalaev (Akhmat Grozny) is making a second substitution, with Marat Bystrov replacing Georgi Melkadze.
In the minute 58, Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Valeriu Ciuperca for Tambov gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Spartak Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Tambov in Tambov.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny at Spartak Stadium.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Tambov.
Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny's Vladimir Iljin misses with an attempt on goal.
Sergei Ivanov awards Tambov a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Sergei Ivanov signals a Tambov throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Tambov close to the penalty box.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Tambov just outside Akhmat Grozny's area.
Sergei Ivanov awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 73, Lechii Sadulaev is replacing Bernard Berisha for Akhmat Grozny at Spartak Stadium.
Sergei Ivanov awards Tambov a goal kick.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Artem Timofeev of Akhmat Grozny smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 76, Sergey Pervushin is making the team's first substitution at Spartak Stadium with Sebastien Thill replacing Aleksandre Karapetian.
Sergei Ivanov signals a throw-in for Akhmat Grozny, close to Tambov's area.
In the minute 79, Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny are pushing forward but Vladimir Iljin's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 81, Tambov have a goal kick.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tambov make their second substitution with Mikhail Kostyukov replacing German Onugha.
In the minute 82, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Vladimir Iljin for Akhmat Grozny has been booked by Sergei Ivanov and receives a first yellow card.
In Tambov a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Goal! Akhmat Grozny have got their heads in front thanks to a Artem Timofeev strike.
In the minute 88, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Tambov push upfield and Valeriu Ciuperca gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Akhmat Grozny defence.
Artem Timofeev gets his shot on target but fails to score for Akhmat Grozny.
Ball safe as Tambov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
At Spartak Stadium the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Akhmat Grozny's Lechii Sadulaev breaks free at Spartak Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tambov.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tambov.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
Andrey Talalaev is making the team's fourth substitution at Spartak Stadium with Islam Alsultanov replacing Vladimir Iljin.
Vitali Shakhov is replacing Pavel Karasev for the home team.
